services.name: Smart Meter Data Aggregation Service
services.description: This service is designed to facilitate the aggregation and visualization of data collected from smart meters across residential and commercial locations. By providing real-time integration with utility meters, it supports analysis of consumption patterns, leak detection, and demand forecasting.

services.name: Renewable Energy Output Prediction API
services.description: Aimed at renewable power producers, this API utilizes weather forecasting and historical performance data to generate predictive analytics for power output from wind, solar, and hydropower sources, enhancing grid stability and resource allocation.

services.name: Infrastructure Fault Detection System
services.description: This RESTful API is built to monitor and analyze infrastructure data such as pipelines and power grids in real-time. It identifies anomalies, predicts failures, and advises preventive maintenance, ensuring uninterrupted service delivery.

services.name: Consumer Engagement Portal Service
services.description: Providing utilities customers with an interactive dashboard through this service, users can view their consumption history, set usage goals, make payments, and receive energy-saving tips tailored to their usage patterns.

services.name: Distributed Generation Optimization Tool
services.description: This tool connects with distributed energy resources like solar panels and batteries, providing an interface for load balancing, energy storage optimization, and synchronization with main grid demands, yielding increased efficiency in energy utilization.
